system.note: Placed Rather than thrown. Attached to a wall, bulkhead, vehicle, etc. Comes with an integrated timer which can be set to up to 1 hour. Anyone on the other side of a surface destroyed by this takes half the damage of the Melta Bomb. Set by a Demolitions Test, if failed by 4+ DoF, bomb immediately explodes.
